title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.
highlights: pull & run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via the same REST endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, and user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, fluent builders, POJO model classes, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, list, delete.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (terminal UI) for Ollama written in Rust; interactive model picker, chat history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane; supports code completion & explanation.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for running Ollama on edge devices (Jetson, Raspberry Pi), Docker Compose stacks, and fine-tuning tips.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-affinity and horizontal pod autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) with one-line run commands and Compose examples.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for vector search; written in C++ with SQLite vec extension.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds a /ollama slash command to summarize blocks, brainstorm ideas or translate text using local models.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama server and CLI with automatic CUDA/ROCm runtime detection for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Llama-3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, Mistral, Solar, etc., with quantization notes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container and exposes it to your CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama; small surface area, idiomatic error handling, and native context cancellation.
